Plot: ***WARNING: THIS BOOK CONTAINS DETAILED SEXUAL SITUATIONS.*** *** Not recommended for people under 18 years of age.*** Lorraine ‘Rae’ Scott (shoe-lover and hopeful future boutique owner), has loved Elliott Steele (super-hot, badass Investigator), for as long as she can remember, but she locked the feelings away, when he started sleeping with every girl he could get. He’s never wanted Rae. Rae’s never wanted anyone else. When trouble comes knocking on Rae’s door, will Elliott be able to save her? Will he finally return her feelings?... Or will it all be worthless?
